sentence: State senator Doug Mastriano, who ahead of the Tuesday primary, said at a recent debate that he would oppose any exceptions to an abortion ban, such as for rape, incest or the safety of the mother.
author: Joan E Greve
title: Abortion rights: how a governors veto can protect womens freedoms

sentence: The early spending comes after Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro (D) ran an unconventional advertisement spotlighting state Sen. Doug Mastriano (R) and his support for former President Donald Trump.
author: Reid Wilson
title: Democrats spend big in GOP governor primaries
